benefits_section.title: 15 Benefits of Trading In Your Heavy Equipment at THEI
benefits_section.description: Our trade-in program is designed to provide maximum benefits and unmatched convenience for your business.

benefits.title: High & Transparent Trade-In Value
benefits.description: Your old unit is valued competitively with an official appraisal system, ensuring you get the best deal. Maximum trade-in age is 10 years (e.g., a 2015 forklift).

benefits.title: Upgrade to New Technology
benefits.description: Instantly switch to the latest units (diesel, electric, gasoline) that are more energy-efficient and environmentally friendly.

benefits.title: Save on Initial Capital
benefits.description: The value of your old equipment automatically becomes a discount on the new unit purchase, easing your business cash flow.

benefits.title: Fast & Easy Process
benefits.description: All processes from appraisal, documentation, to the handover of old and new units are handled by the THEI team.

benefits.title: Hassle-Free Selling
benefits.description: No need to waste time advertising or selling your old equipment to third parties; just hand it over to THEI.

benefits.title: Longer New Unit Warranty
benefits.description: New units from trade-ins receive an additional promotional value of IDR 20 million from THEI.

benefits.title: Installment Scheme Options
benefits.description: The new unit can be purchased through financing (leasing) after deducting the value of the old unit.

benefits.title: Free Initial Service Period
benefits.description: New units from trade-ins get free filter components for 250, 500, 750, and 1000 Hour Meter intervals.

benefits.title: Market Price Certainty
benefits.description: Transparent appraisal value based on unit condition, working hours, and service history.

benefits.title: Improve Fleet Efficiency
benefits.description: Helping you save time and rejuvenate your old fleet with ease.

benefits.title: Promo Support from TJM Auto Care
benefits.description: Every new trade-in unit is automatically enrolled in TJM's premium after-sales program (standby technicians, emergency hotline, spare parts).

benefits.title: Free Corporate Gift Pack
benefits.description: Receive an exclusive package (uniforms, helmets, vests, and safety kit with your company's branding).

benefits.title: Added Value for Your Company
benefits.description: Get a bonus Corporate Business consultation at Sentinel Law Firm with every trade-in.

benefits.title: Free Delivery in Jabodetabek
benefits.description: Customers will get free delivery for new units within the Jabodetabek area.

benefits.title: Free Operator Training
benefits.description: We provide basic training for your new unit's operator to ensure optimal and safe operation.

steps.title: Contact Us
steps.description: Tell us your needs via phone or our online form.

steps.title: Unit Appraisal
steps.description: Our expert team will visit your location for inspection & appraisal.

steps.title: Accept the Offer
steps.description: Get the best price offer for your old unit.

steps.title: New Unit Delivered
steps.description: Once the deal is done, we deliver the new unit and pick up the old one.

proof_section.video_description: Transparency is key. Watch how our team conducts appraisals and unit handovers.
proof_section.testimonial_quote: The trade-in process at THEI was very professional and fast. The price offered for my old unit was also very fair. Highly recommended!
